notes: Can launch game, navigate menus and even see part of the opening cut scene, but game invariably crashes a minute or two after launching.
title: RiME

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.27.0, 4.19.0-041900rc8-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Crashes after a few minutes without launch option "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%". Playable with KB+M but with NSPro controller the controls are not working correctly. Performance is stuttery and audio has some crackling.
title: RiME

notes: Can confirm disabling Esync keeps the game from crashing. Xbox 360 controller works, but inputs appear to be doubled up likely due to js* and event* instances both being registered. Performance issues can be worked around on Nvidia cards by spoofing an AMD card (https://www.reddit.com/r/SteamPlay/comments/9m18ck/troubleshooting_performance/). Audio problems consistent with those that can be fixed by installing xact to the game prefix via winetricks.
title: RiME

notes:
The game uses a lot of shaders, which need to be compiled, so expect stutter in the beginning. I also tested with the old async pipeline enabled in DXVK. This helps a lot, but you need to patch DXVK yourself. (patch: https://github.com/jomihaka/dxvk-poe-hack)

Audio crackling: Install xact and set PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC=60.

 ||

Stutter/Lags : Force 60fps + Vsync via ingame settings. I can get about 80fps but unlocking frames does introduce stutter.

||

Double inputs with DS4 Controller: Just unplug and replug the controller while the game is already running

||

Does NOT crash with ESYNC enabled for me. I also spoofed an AMD card, but, didn't really notice any difference in performance. All in all the games runs relatively smooth with 60fps.
title: RiME

notes: A little bit of stutter on "High" graphics settings until I set framerate to 60fps
title: RiME

notes:
The game needs to have `esync` disabled to prevent crashes.
To fix audio cracklings install `xact` and set `xaudio2_7` to native.
To get the gamepad working install `dinput8` and set `dinput8` to native.
Then the game works pretty good.
title: RiME

notes: I needed to use winetricks xact to fix audio clicking.
title: RiME
